commit.message:
qt: Periodic transifex update

Pulls in the following new languages:

- `af` Afrikaans
- `es_419` Spanish (Latin America)
- `es_AR` Spanish (Argentina)
- `es_CO` Spanish (Colombia)
- `fil` Filipino
- `it_IT` Italian (Italy)
- `ro` Romanian
- `sr@latin` Serbian (Latin)
- `ta` Tamil
- `uz@Latn` Uzbek (Latin)
- `zh_HK` Chinese (Hong Kong)
